PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2007-05532007-04-19,  FIN,  ,  , 
ActIncome Tax Act
PrecisRegulations Amending the INCOME TAX REGULATIONS (CHARITABLE DONATIONS) by requiring all registered charities to print the name and Internet address of the Canada Revenue Agency on their official receipts, and by adding an American charity, Friends of the Nature Conservancy of Canada, Inc., to the list of prescribed foreign charities (section 3504).
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2007-0074 Publication Date: 2007-05-02
AttachmentsAttachment
